name: talatrivia
description: Plataforma de Trivia Empresarial - Sistema completo con Symfony y Next.js

scripts.setup: docker compose up -d database api api_nginx && docker compose exec -T api bin/console doctrine:migrations:migrate --no-interaction && docker compose exec -T api bin/console hautelook:fixtures:load --no-interaction
scripts.setup:full: npm run docker:up && npm run setup
scripts.docker:backend: docker compose up -d database api api_nginx
scripts.docker:backend:down: docker compose stop api api_nginx database
scripts.dev:api: docker compose up -d database api api_nginx
scripts.dev:all: npm run docker:backend && npm run dev:frontend
